Value.label: Primary Notification Volume Level
Value.Help: This parameter sets the volume of the Siren (primary) sound. There are three possible volume levels available.

Value.label: Primary Notification Length
Value.Help: This parameter defines the length of the Alarm/primary notification.

Value.label: Secondary Notification Length
Value.Help: This parameter defines the number of times the Chime/Secondary Notification will play.

Value.label: Secondary Notification Volume
Value.Help: This parameter sets the volume of the Chime (secondary) sound. There are three possible volume levels available.

Value.label: Primary Notification Sound
Value.Help: The Siren offers ten different sounds to use as the Siren (primary) notification. This parameter sets the Siren (primary) notification sound.

Value.label: Secondary Notification Sound
Value.Help: If Parameter 7 is set to 02, the Siren will play a secondary chime sound instead of the main alarm. The Siren offers ten different sounds to use as the Chime (secondary) notification. This parameter sets the Chime (secondary) notification sound.

Value.label: Toggle Secondary Chime
Value.Help: This Parameter toggles between the Primary and Secondary notification sound to be played when the Siren receives a BINARY_SWITCH_SET(FF) command.

Value.label: Primary Notification Strobe
Value.Help: This Parameter enables or disables the Flashing LED Ring (strobe) accompanying the Primary Notification.

Value.label: Secondary Notification Strobe
Value.Help: This Parameter enables or disables the Flashing LED Ring (strobe) accompanying the Secondary Notification.
